QuestData.Title: The Next Step
QuestData.Description:
Your efforts have not gone unnoticed, but there are other realms that still require your aid.
Consider the next step in your journey, mortal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Choose where to go in the Shadowlands.
QuestData.RewardText: A wise decision. See to it that they receive your aid swiftly.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Tal-Inara to choose where to go
